outputs.output_descr:
The project is designed to support peace building in Ethiopia. It is intended to enhance the capacities of the House of Federation and Ministry of Federal Affairs in:
1.Improving conflict transfromation mechanisms to reduce ethnic/political confrontation and antagonism through technical advisory (for teh formualtion of a National Strategy); training; increased regional cooperation and consolidating a National conlict assessment and mapping; and
2.Enhancing civic responsibility by developing a nation-wide peace-building information programme

project_descr: Strengthening National Capacity for Confilict Transformation
